arts.ttl: Inter Miami 4–1 Houston Dynamo: Player Ratings as Herons Dominate Without Lionel Messi
arts.sum: Luis Suárez scored a goal and assisted thrice as Inter Miami pushed past the Houston Dynamo without Lionel Messi.

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi Missing Inter Miami Matches: Fuming Fans, Lawsuits and How Clubs Deal With It
arts.sum: Inter Miami CF are a hot MLS ticket, but fans are more than frustrated when Lionel Messi doesn't take the pitch.

arts.ttl: Messi 'wasn't happy on a daily basis' at PSG
arts.sum: Eight-time Men's Ballon d'Or winner Lionel Messi says he "didn't enjoy" playing for French club Paris St-Germain during his two-year spell and was "unhappy."

arts.ttl: Messi no-show prompts Houston Dynamo to issue apology and free tickets
arts.sum: Argentinian not listed as injured but did not make trip Match was set to be sellout with expensive resales MLS club Houston Dynamo have issued an apology to fans after Lionel Messi was revealed by various outlets to not be in the Inter Miami traveling party for Sunday night’s game between the sides. The Texas club also promised free tickets to a future match to all in attendance due to Messi’s absence. In their statement, the Dynamo indicated that they believed Messi would be fit to play the match based on his name not being listed on Inter Miami’s player status report. The player status report, released before matches, is traditionally where teams will list players that are carrying injuries or who are otherwise out of action. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Inter Miami Predicted Lineup vs. Houston Dynamo: MLS
arts.sum: Lionel Messi and Inter Miami visit the Houston Dynamo on Sunday at 7:00 pm ET

arts.ttl: Houston Dynamo’s ‘gift’ response to Messi’s Miami absence
arts.sum: This Saturday, it was confirmed that Lionel Messi did not travel with Javier Mascherano’s Inter Miami ahead of their match against Houston Dynamo on Sunday, March 2, at Shell Energy Stadium. “The Houston Dynamo are excited to host Inter Miami CF at Shell Energy Stadium on Sunday evening.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Major League Soccer predictions including Houston Dynamo vs. Inter Miami
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Major League Soccer fixtures, including Houston Dynamo vs. Inter Miami.

arts.ttl: Bizarre reason Lionel Messi will miss Inter Miami's MLS clash against Houston Dynamo
arts.sum: The 2025 MLS season is only in its second week, yet the league's main attraction, Lionel Messi, is already missing in action. He did not travel with his Inter Miami teammates to face the Houston Dynamo.

Inter Miami traveled to Houston on Saturday for its Week 2 showdown against the Dynamo in the 2025 Major League Soccer season. However, the biggest storyline surrounding the trip is the shock absence of Lionel Messi, confirming that the global superstar will not take part in Sunday night’s matchup at Shell Energy Stadium (8:00 p.m. EST).

arts.ttl: Houston offers fans free ticket with Messi rested
arts.sum: Lionel Messi did not travel with his Inter Miami teammates to Texas to face the Houston Dynamo at Shell Energy Stadium on Sunday night, a source confirmed to ESPN.
